item.title: Learnings From Clean Code
item.description: Learnings from Robert “Uncle Bob” Martin Robert Martin, fondly known as “Uncle Bob” in the software community, is a software engineer and more famously an author and one of the founding fathers of software movements like software craftsmanship, agile methodology, and test-driven development.
